sentences.en: And ordering French and German books by the crate from the Yankees!
sentences.cn: 还要从北方佬那儿一大箱一大箱地订购法文和德文书呢!

sentences.en: Clutching his matches he set out along the main road towards Xizhimen Crate.
sentences.cn: 拿着两包火柴,顺着大道他往西直门走.

sentences.en: Equipment and office supplies were crated and shipped.
sentences.cn: 设备及办公用品被装箱运走了。

sentences.en: He bought a crate of oranges for his children.
sentences.cn: 他给孩子买了一箱橘子.

sentences.en: He found a big hole in the bottom of the crate!
sentences.cn: 竹篓下面有个好大的洞呀!

sentences.en: Now he was looking through tiny crack between crate and wall.
sentences.cn: 现在他透过箱子和墙之间的那道缝隙.

sentences.en: Someone has sticked a label on the crate.
sentences.cn: 有人在板条箱上贴了标签。

sentences.en: Someone has stuck a label on the crate.
sentences.cn: 有人在板条箱上贴了标签.

sentences.en: The cat was sitting on an upturned crate.
sentences.cn: 猫儿蹲坐在倒放的板条箱上.

sentences.en: The crate is marked " put down carefully ".
sentences.cn: 货箱上标明 “ 小心轻放 ”.

sentences.en: The grenades had busted every crate and punched rents into the walls.
sentences.cn: 两个榴弹炸碎了每个板条箱,在墙上割出无数裂缝.

sentences.en: The solemn Mr. Merryweather had to perch himself upon a crate.
sentences.cn: 这位庄重的梅里韦瑟先生只好坐到一只板条箱上.

sentences.en: The workers tightly packed the goods in the crate.
sentences.cn: 工人们把货物严紧地包装在箱子里.

sentences.en: Use an empty crate as a makeshift for a table.
What is the net force acting on the crate?
sentences.cn: 真正附在板箱上的力是多少?

trans.tran_cn: 大木箱，塑料分格箱，一箱（的量）
trans.tran_en: a large box made of wood or plastic that is used for carrying fruit, bottles etc
to pack things into a crate
